channel.title: WTF: Some White Kid Spazzes Out After His Mother Cancels His World Of Warcraft
channel.description:
[size=13pt][b]Insane Addiction: Some White Kid Spazzes Out After His Mother Cancels His World Of Warcraft Account! (He Then Trys To Rape Himself With A Remote Control)[/b][/size]
Comment: I found this video from the hip hop CNN website World Star Hip Hop(WSHH), wierd to ever see this happen. This kid is crazy! Online games are officially the most dangerous to actually get into nowaday, I thought I've seen worst, but this is just off man. Seriously defines the child being controled by the entertainment of a game :(. Don't laugh cuz this is nothing to laugh about at all, its a possible chance anyone here likes gore but still its not funny or w/e. I just posted this to show you guys how serious people are with the famous online games these days.
Click here for video:
http://www.worldstarhiphop.com/videos/video.php?v=wshh48ElaMqo55eSuMoR

item.title: WTF: Some White Kid Spazzes Out After His Mother Cancels His World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

PeterMan:

In case you don’t know, he is black.

Judging by the context, I figured that out.

PeterMan:

I don’t get what is so awarding about hating another group of people. Can you tell me, T4?

It’s not like other races don’t poke fun at ‘white people’, and hell minorities get to hide behind political correctness. Discrimination is everywhere, it is applied in almost all species’ interactions; examples include: natural selection, mating, etc. I don’t understand what is wrong with it or why humanitarians ‘wage war’ against it.

Plus,

Speljohan:

We all knew. We don’t hate another group of people, it’s just a meme.

Read full topic
